org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.auctions

Class AccessMediator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.auctions.AccessMediator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Auctioneer

    public class AccessMediator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Auctioneer
    The AccessMediator acts as an Auctioneer, creating an Auction thread for the required file.

    Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

      • getMaxPrice

        public float getMaxPrice()
        The maximum price the AccessMediator is prepared to pay for a file. Currently there are no budget constraints to this is simply Float.MAX_VALUE.
        Specified by:
        getMaxPrice in interface Auctioneer
        Returns:
        The maximum price this Auctioneer will pay for the file

      • getSite

        public GridSite getSite()
        Return the GridSite where this AccessMediator is located.
        Specified by:
        getSite in interface Auctioneer
        Returns:
        The Auctioneer site

      • getLocalSE

        public StorageElement getLocalSE()
        Called by Auction to find the site to replicate to when replicating as the result of an auction. Replication should never be performed on behalf of an AccessMediator (replication will already have been performed by the StorageBroker on the site, in the nested auction) so this returns null.
        Returns:
        null

      • fileAvailable

        public void fileAvailable(Auction a,
                 DataFile winningFile)
        When the file is available, remember where it is and wake up the ComputingElement
        Specified by:
        fileAvailable in interface Auctioneer
        Parameters:
        a - The auction in question
        winningFile - the DataFile of the winning replica, or null if noone won.
